item.description: Hiker Rescue - Hoist Operation; INC#1179; 04:51PM; 13000 W Sayre St; MAP: https://bit.ly/3S1yzWf; Sylmar; Firefighters located a 57yo female hiker with a non-life threatening injury. The patient also has her dog with her. LAFD Air Ops will be conducting a hoist operation for the patient. One of the rescuers is walking the dog part way down to firefighters making their way up to the location on foot. The original 9-1-1 call was received at 4:18PM. No further details.; FS 91; Batt 12; Valley Bureau; Council District 7; BC12 E239 E298 E75 E91 H2 H3 HA2 HA3 RA75 RH114 T39 T98; CH8; 17; Margaret Stewart

KNOCKDOWN Structure Fire; INC#0881; 01:52PM; 22135 W Archwood St; MAP: https://bit.ly/3lDcWPH; Canoga Park; KNOCKDOWN: 30 firefighters extinguished the fire in 25 minutes with no injuries reported. The initial reports indicate the fire possibly started in some equipment outside and extended into the attic. Crews protected the interior from as much damage as possible while the attic fire was extinguished. No further details. ; FS 105; Batt 17; Valley Bureau; Council District 3; BC17 E105 E273 E293 E305 E72 RA73 RA90 T73 T93; CH9; 17; Margaret Stewart

Update Structure Fire; INC#0881; 01:41PM; 22135 W Archwood St; MAP: https://bit.ly/3lDcWPH; Canoga Park; The interior of the home is clear and firefighters are conducting salvage operations to protect property while fire attack and roof operations are working to isolate and extinguish a well developed attic fire. All occupants were reported to have safely exited the structure prior to LAFD arrival. No injuries reported.; FS 105; Batt 17; Valley Bureau; Council District 3; BC17 E105 E273 E293 E305 E72 RA73 RA90 T73 T93; CH9; 17; Margaret Stewart

Structure Fire; INC#0881; 01:27PM; 22130 W Archwood St; MAP: https://bit.ly/3lztMPB; Canoga Park; One story, single family dwelling with smoke showing from the attic. Firefighters are in the offensive mode. One additional task force requested. ; FS 105; Batt 17; Valley Bureau; Council District 3; BC17 E105 E293 E72 RA73 T93; CH9; 17; Margaret Stewart

Hiker Rescue - Hoist Operation; INC#0747; 12:44PM; 2720 Mandeville Canyon Rd; MAP: https://bit.ly/3K8oCEl; Brentwood; Firefighters located a 19yo male mountain biker who sustained a fall and with serious injuries to his leg. LAFD Air Ops is conducting a hoist operation and will transport to the hospital. The 9-1-1 call was received at 12:17PM. No further details.; FS 19; Batt 9; West Bureau; Council District 11; AO1 AO2 BC9 E269 E69 H2 H3 HA2 HA3 RA19 RH114 T69; CH7; 13; Margaret Stewart

Hiker Rescue - Hoist Operation; INC#0520; 09:53AM; 999 Temescal Canyon Rd; MAP: https://bit.ly/3K86sCP; Pacific Palisades; Firefighters located a 63 yo female hiker with a non-life threatening lower leg injury. LAFD Air Ops will be conducting a hoist operation to transport the patient to the hospital. No further details.; FS 69; Batt 9; West Bureau; Council District 11; AO1 AO2 BC18 BC9 E269 E69 H2 H3 HA2 HA3 RA69 RH114 T69; CH7; 13; Margaret Stewart

KNOCKDOWN Structure Fire; INC#1165; 03:42PM; 410 E Manitoba St; MAP: https://bit.ly/3E7owJA; Playa del Rey; KNOCKDOWN: 26 firefighters extinguished the fire in 19 minutes. Crews contained the fire to the room of origin in the structure. The male patient (age unknown) with burn injuries (currently being assessed on scene by firefighter/paramedics) may have been involved in the cause of the fire and LAFD Arson section was notified and are responding for the investigation. No further details.; FS 67; Batt 4; West Bureau; Council District 11; BC4 E205 E5 E51 E67 EM4 RA33 RA5 RA69 T5; CH9; 13; Margaret Stewart

Structure Fire; INC#1165; 03:23PM; 410 E Manitoba St; MAP: https://bit.ly/3E7owJA; Playa del Rey; One story, single family dwelling with fire showing. Firefighters are in the offensive mode. There are initial reports of one patient with possible burn injuries.; FS 67; Batt 4; West Bureau; Council District 11; BC4 E205 E5 E67 RA69 T5; CH9; 13; Margaret Stewart

KNOCKDOWN Structure Fire; INC#1049; 02:35PM; 6641 N Whitsett Av; MAP: https://bit.ly/3I0AF3Q; Valley Glen; KNOCKDOWN: 28 firefighters extinguished the fire in 17 minutes with no injuries reported. The fire extended into the common attic space and was burning east from the end unit towards Whitsett. Firefighters located and stopped the fire from extending into the adjoined units. Whitsett Ave is closed to traffic between Archwood St and Kittridge St - drivers are asked to avoid the area. Cause and $ loss TBD. No further details.; FS 89; Batt 14; Valley Bureau; Council District 2; BC14 E102 E260 E60 E89 RA89 T60 T89; CH9; 17; Margaret Stewart

Structure Fire; INC#1049; 02:18PM; 6641 N Whitsett Av; MAP: https://bit.ly/3I0AF3Q; Valley Glen; A row of bungalows with fire in the end unit. Firefighters are in the offensive mode with no other buildings exposed.; FS 89; Batt 14; Valley Bureau; Council District 2; BC14 E102 E260 E60 E89 RA89 T60 T89; CH9; 17; Margaret Stewart
